text: Oni oslushalis' yego i ne posledovali yego sovetu. Oni tak sil'no vozgordilis', chto prenebregli yego ugrozoy i ubili verblyuditsu. On skazal im: "Naslazhdaytes' v vashikh domakh tri dnya, potom vam pridot ot Allakha nakazaniye. Eto obeshchaniye Allakha, a Yego obeshchaniye - istina i obyazatel'no sbudetsya
